text: "Falling in Love" is the only single released by American rapper New Born. Released in 1993, the song peaked at #97 on the Billboard Hot 100. A full- length album to promote the single never materialized. ==Chart positions== {|Class = "wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (1993) !Peak position |- |US Billboard Hot 100 |align=center|97 |- |US Rhythmic Top 40 (Billboard) |align=center|38 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 songs Category:American hip hop songs Category:1993 debut singles Category:Relativity Records singles Category:Song recordings produced by Kwamé
title: Falling in Love (New Born song)
